Title: Threats of Zekvir
Description:
Someone's watchin' us, $n. They put this chest here for us to find.

Let me know when you're ready. I'll trigger the trap here to see just what exactly is going on.
ObjectivesText: Speak with Brann Bronzebeard to investigate the strange chest.
RewardText:
Well, I'm not one tae let a little threat stop me from exploring farther. Looks like I got more investigating tae do. 

I'm sure I'll see you again real soon!

Objectives.Text: Ask Brann to disarm the trap
